version.name: Get employer levy declarations
version.description: Returns a list of levy declarations for a given employer reference.

param.name: empref
param.value: A valid (URL encoded) employer reference for the PAYE scheme.

param.name: fromDate
param.value: The date of the earliest record to return. If no date is supplied the default date of current month/year - 6 years will be used.

param.name: toDate
param.value: The date of the latest record to return. If no date is supplied the default date of 'now'/'today' will be used.

field.name: empref
field.description: The PAYE Reference for the employer. This will be the same as provided in the URL

field.name: declarations[].id
field.description: A unique identifier for the declaration. This will remain consistent from one call to the API to the next so that the client can identify declarations they’ve already retrieved. It is the identifier assigned by the RTI system to the EPS return, so it is possible to cross-reference with HMRC if needed

field.name: declarations[].dateCeased
field.description: If present, indicates the date that the payroll scheme was ceased

field.name: declarations[].inactiveFrom
field.description: The date after which the payroll scheme will be active again. Should always be the 5th of the month of the last inactive payroll period

field.name: declarations[].inactiveTo
field.description: The date after which the payroll scheme will be active again. Should always be the 5th of the month of the last inactive payroll period

field.name: declarations[].noPaymentForPeriod
field.description: If present, will always have the value true and indicates that no declaration was necessary for this period. This can be interpreted to mean that the YTD levy balance is unchanged from the previous submitted value

field.name: declarations[].submissionTime
field.description: the time at which the EPS submission that this declaration relates to was received by HMRC

field.name: declarations[].payrollPeriod.year
field.description: The tax year of the payroll period against which the declaration was made

field.name: declarations[].payrollPeriod.month
field.description: The tax month of the payroll period against which the declaration was made. Month 1 is April.

field.name: declarations[].levyDueYTD
field.description: The amount of apprenticeship levy that was declared in the payroll month.

field.name: declarations[].allowance
field.description: The annual amount of apprenticeship levy allowance that has been allocated to this payroll scheme. If absent then the value can be taken as 0. The maximum value in the 2017/18 will be 15,000
